job_description: A stopgap to allow the user to change their faction at the start of the game.

description: A device used to improve the player character's relationship with Caesar's Legion. Should only be available at spawn, otherwise a glitch has occurred.

use_action.summon_msg: A faction changing NPC appears before you!

dynamic_line.yes: Hello lady, I am a stopgap to allow the user to change their faction at the start of the game. Otherwise it would be impossible to play for the Empire on an Imperial Profession Start.
dynamic_line.no: Hello sir, I am a stopgap to allow the user to change their faction at the start of the game. Otherwise it would be impossible to play for the Empire on an Imperial Profession Start.

responses.text: Increase the Empire's reputation with me.

dynamic_line.yes: I have improved your relationship with Caesar's Legion by 30 points.
dynamic_line.no: I have improved your relationship with Caesar's Legion by 30 points.

responses.text: Now change my relationship with Gallia.

dynamic_line.yes: I have decreased your relationship with New California Republic by 30 points.
dynamic_line.no: I have decreased your relationship with New California Republic by 30 points.
